cards.title: Peacekeeper
powers: {Peacekeeper} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. You may draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: The next time a hero uses a power, that hero deals 1 target 1 projectile damage.
Select a hero target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.

cards.title: Ambush
body: When this card enters play, return your other maneuvers in play to your hand.
Prevent the first damage dealt to {Peacekeeper} by non-hero targets each turn. When {Peacekeeper} deals or is dealt damage by another target, destroy this card.
powers: Increase damage {Peacekeeper} deals to non-hero targets by 2 until this card leaves play.

flavorQuotes.text: I love a good trap, but I was{BR}hoping for something a bit more flashy.

cards.title: Bullet Hell
body: When this card enters play, return your other maneuvers in play to your hand.
Prevent the first card draw during your draw phase.
powers: [y=0.95]Until the start of your next turn, the first time each turn any target deals damage, {Peacekeeper} may discard a card to deal 1 target 1 projectile damage.[/y]
Draw a card or destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: We're moving out, Peace. Make it rain.

cards.title: Burst of Speed
body: You may draw 1 card and play 1 card. {Peacekeeper} deals himself 2 irreducible toxic damage.
If {Peacekeeper} was dealt damage this way, you may play 1 card.

flavorQuotes.text: Subject's reaction times and{BR}mobility are off the charts. The serum{BR}appears to be permanently altering his{BR}physiology to maximize his combat prowess.

cards.title: Codename: Peacekeeper
body: {Peacekeeper} deals 1 target X melee damage, where X = the number of symptoms in play.
{Peacekeeper} deals himself 2 toxic damage. If he is dealt damage this way, he deals the original target 3 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I'm no hero. I'm not a{BR}soldier anymore, but I'm still a{BR}peacekeeper. I can't stay off{BR}my meds for long, but if that's what it{BR}takes to save your city, I'm in.

cards.title: Cover Fire
body: When this card enters play, return your other maneuvers in play to your hand.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
powers: Until the start of your next turn, the first time each turn any hero target would be dealt damage by another target, reduce that damage by 1, then {Peacekeeper} deals the source of that damage 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: [y=0.90]Don't push it, Vidal. Varano here{BR}pulled my men out of hell more times{BR}than I can count, and that's the only reason{BR}I'm tolerating your expedition.

cards.title: Excess Adrenaline
body: At the end of your turn, you may draw or play a card. Then {Peacekeeper} deals himself 1 irreducible toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Hey Amalgam! They've got nothing{BR}you haven't seen before, but I can do{BR}something you can't!

cards.flavorReference: Peacekeeper, Apocalypse 10: The Rise of Amalgam

cards.title: Frag Grenades
powers: {Peacekeeper} deals up to 3 targets 2 fire damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: Just like old times.

cards.title: Green Veins
body: The first time each turn damage is redirected from {Peacekeeper} to another target, draw a card.
When {Peacekeeper} would be dealt damage by any non-hero target, you may discard 2 cards to redirect that damage to another target.
At the end of your turn, {Peacekeeper} deals himself 1 irreducible toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Looking a little{BR}green today, Peace.
We can't all afford{BR}that fancy spray-tan.

cards.title: If You Desire Peace...
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 2 equipment cards are revealed. Put one into your hand or into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Without your little girlfriend to protect you, you're nothing.
Do you even read your{BR}mission briefings?

cards.title: NBE-2 Combat Knife
body: Increase melee damage dealt by {Peacekeeper} by 1.
powers: {Peacekeeper} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. If that target dealt {Peacekeeper} melee damage since the start of your last turn, increase that damage by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Did you really{BR}bring a knife to a gun fight?
Brought my fists and{BR}elbows too.

cards.title: Prepare for War
body: Search your deck for a maneuver and put it into play.
You may put a maneuver from your trash on top of your deck.
Shuffle your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Fine! Want to know why I{BR}picked you? I can't protect people,{BR}you can! I'm going to go make a mess. Your job is to save bystanders, got it?

cards.title: S3-99 Modified Assault Rifle
body: Increase projectile damage dealt by {Peacekeeper} by 1.
powers: {Peacekeeper} deals 1 target 2 projectile damage, then deals 1 target 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Custom made to fit your{BR}strengths. You should be proud{BR}of the work you do, son. If we had more men like you, the world would be{BR}a safer place.

cards.title: Sniper Perch
body: When this card enters play, return your other maneuvers in play to your hand.
Reduce damage dealt to {Peacekeeper} by 2. When {Peacekeeper} is dealt damage by another target or you use a power on another card, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Lure them out in the open.{BR}I have a surprise prepared.

cards.title: System Purge
body: Draw a card.
Destroy a serum or symptom. If a card was destroyed this way, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and one on the bottom of the deck.

flavorQuotes.text: I was ordered not to{BR}kill you, but I will if you want.
No, that was... hyperbole,{BR}but thank you. You're a true friend.

cards.title: Toxic Blood
body: Increase damage dealt by {Peacekeeper} to other targets by 1.
At the end of your turn, {Peacekeeper} deals himself 1 irreducible toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: That serum is the only way I{BR}can have a normal life. Miss a dose, my{BR}veins start to turn green. I get strong{BR}and fast, but I start dying.

cards.title: Up Close and Personal
body: When this card enters play, return your other maneuvers in play to your hand.
Play this card next to a target. Redirect all damage dealt by that target to {Peacekeeper}. Reduce non-melee damage that target deals to {Peacekeeper} by 1.
powers: {Peacekeeper} deals the target next to this card 3 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You want him? Come get him.

cards.title: X51-7 Booster Shot
body: When this card enters play, destroy your other serums.
Damage dealt by {Peacekeeper} to other targets is increased by 2 and irreducible.
Reduce damage dealt to {Peacekeeper} by 1.
At the start of your turn, {Peacekeeper} deals himself 2 irreducible toxic damage. Then you may play a symptom. Then destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Listen, I can't tell you{BR}what to do. You're a good soldier{BR}with or without the serum. We may live, we may die. If it were me, I don't know...

cards.title: Y-Tech Custom Serum 4319B
body: When this card enters play, destroy your other serums.
{Peacekeeper} is immune to toxic damage.
At the end of your turn, return a symptom in play to your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: No sudden movements. Turn{BR}around slowly. I want to know who you{BR}are, why you're here, and how you know{BR}about my serum.
